title: How to be a LoL youtuber:
body:
NightBlue3:
Step 1: Play a Jungler or any fancy champion
Step 2: Put in unnecessary effects in your video
Step 3: Put in clickbait by all capping the title and putting in a sexy fanart of a LoL girl.

Redmercy/Pants Are Dragon:
Step 1: Be either informative or be entertaining. Only one.
Step 2: Step in the PBE.
Step 3: Put in clickbait, but on a lower scale than NightBlue3.

Brofresco:
Step 1: Be cringy. That's all.

MagikarpUsedFly:
Step 1: Explain everything wrong abut your champion.
Step 2: Play with friends.
Step 3: Be legitimately enjoyable to watch.

Trinimmortal:
Step 1: Be genuinely enjoyable and funny to watch. Really simple, but effective.
OR....
PLAY YASUO!

Darkk Mane:
Step 1: Mitochondria is the powerhouse of the cell.

BrickyOrchid8:
Step 1: Be like Trinimmortal, but more informative.
Also, play either For Honor or Dark Souls.

######This is supposed to be a joke. Please don't kill me.

Edit: You guys can put in more lol youtubers if you like then try to make steps on how to be like them, but make it as humorously accurate as possible.

Extra Edit: 
Now to generalize all LoL youtubers:
Step 1: Use either generic pop and/or RnB and Rap, NCS or Monstercat songs as your background music in your videos.

replies.body: ***WHAT'S UP GUYS IT'S ME JEREMY***

**_I, AM GOING TO BEAT, LEAGUE OF LEGENDS_**

Nah, jk. here's a proper response:

**_HEY GUYS, WHAT IS UP AND WELCOME TO A NEW LEAGUE OF LEGENDS VIDEO._**

#*BRING IT IN PIMPS AND PLAYERS BROFRESCO HERE AND TODAY WE'RE PLAYING THE NEW TALON HP REGEN BUFFS-*

*Gets shot by a tranquilizer*
**_IF WE CAN GET THIS TO A 1000 LIKES, I'LL BUY MYSELF A PIZZA_**
_Actually buys pizza._
Now let me explain my theories and fantasies by speaking really slow, repeating words Actually and Really at least 30 times per video and stretching it artifically to 10 minutes+.

UberDanger:
Step 1: Take a line of coke
Step 2: Build like you have brain damage
Step 3: Add hentai

> [{quoted}](name=Snowplosion,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LGmcEcET,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-03-11T07:19:43.535+0000)
>
> UberDanger:
> Step 1: Take a line of coke
> Step 2: Build like you have brain damage
> Step 3: Add hentai
> Step 4: Get away with pedophilia due to international laws

ftfy
That blow was so low that was a freaking sweep kick.
?  I've missed something.  UberDanger is a pedophile?
Yes

Has he done something to be condemned for? Pedophilia is a mental illness, and unless he's committed a crime it's not something that's appropriate as gossip. If anything, people should be pushing him to get treatment.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LGmcEcET,comment-id=00060000000100000000,timestamp=2017-03-11T20:43:33.805+0000)
>
> Has he done something to be condemned for? Pedophilia is a mental illness, and unless he's committed a crime it's not something that's appropriate as gossip. If anything, people should be pushing him to get treatment.

It wasn't considered pedophilia becuase the age of consent in the country he was in during Pax was 14. But he's american and damn well knew what he was getting into. He can't be legally prosecuted but it was still *&%$ed up.

*does a quick google search*

The cut-off point for it to be technically pedophilia is... 13ish, making it more like Ephebophilia...

But we're not here to talk technical details. I see what everyone's talking about now. Born and raised in America, that'd be like a Islamic man forcing a child to wear a hijab--It goes against *your own* culture. It'd be one thing if he immigrated permanently, I guess, but even that's not going to stop fellow Americans from ostracizing him...

... in other words, considering how he was raised and just in general really, that's fucking creepy. Even if it's not "technically" pedophilia, and even if he's not mentally ill, that's creepy as fuck. That's taking advantage of a young girl who's barely hit puberty.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} WHY IS IT SO ACCURATE

Because why the hell not?

Also, the only LoL youtubers I have respect to are Trinimmortal (really, really funny youtuber), BrickyOrchid8 and to an extent, Redmercy.

Kshaway

1. Record clips of a average bronze 5 game.

2. Add funny music.

3. ???

4. Profit.

DiscoHeat

1. Record clips of average bronze 5 chat.

2. Add funny music

3. ???

4. Profit

I swear to God, describing LoL youtubers can sometimes be so painfully accurate, it can be turned into memes.
Also, here's are 2 other LoL youtubers for you guys that I should've included:

Youmuus:
Step 1: Play unorthodox champions or Rengar
Step 2: Make an off meta build
Step 3: ?????
Step 4: Profit

Yassuo:
Step 1: Play Yasuo. 
Step 2: Make the video as meme-y as possible

Edit: Here's more:
Lilypichu:
Step 1: Have a cute voice.
Step 2: Be fun to watch.

Keyori:
Step 1: Make videos with friends.
Step 2: Take a long hiatus from youtube career.

Instalok:
Step 1: Select a champion.
Step 2: Make a genuinely good song about selected champion.
Step 3: ????
Step 4: Profit

Frost Prime:
Step 1: Lightning Shen

Siv HD:
Step 1: Look very white.
Step 2: Play Ezreal or Leblanc.
Step 3: Make sick outplays.
Step 4: _"You even trying?"_ (points to you if you get the reference)

Dong Huap:
Step 1: Look Asian
Step 2: Describe champions the stupidest way possible.
Step 3: Explain how to counter that champion the most hyperbolic way possible.

Calbel:
Step 1: Find funny chat logs.
Step 2: Use "bad" meme music as background and use meme-y voice.

**RossBoomSocks**

Step 1: Obtain Sexy Scottish Accent
Step 2: Explain why you hate a champion

anklespankin:
-photoshop face onto champion portrait
-clickbait title
-find out he hardly ever does high elo games despite being a diamond player, all he does is smash silvers on his numerous smurfs
-disappoint
Whats up guys its me jeremy here with another misleading league video talking about changes that might happen in 2019 and providing 0 information while talking about random shit.

You forgot about NB3 - build all AD or all AP regardless of what your team needs and also play in like plat elo so that you dont lose every game because of said build.  I used to watch that guy because he was rank 1 in challenger and was very informative and helfpul, now he is weabo cringe master...
Its amusing when you need something to throw on that you don't really need to pay much attention to.

Why is this downvoted? I listen to him as I do dishes.

He may be a good player, but his Youtube channel as of now is 99% meme machine. For information I'd go to Valkrin.
Regardless when AP OR AD FULL is built, At least NB3 plays really effectively no matter the ELO.
It's "amusing" on how NB3 still makes a profit just by smurfing, over, and over, and over again.

Yeah its sad because he is a great player. I mean I watch like Redmercy or Gbay or something and I know I am just ~plat so I shouldnt talk like this, but they are really not that good and make plenty of mistakes while NB3 is still an amazing player and you can see that, just wish he would stop throwing anime shit (I love anime btw, but thats too much) and going 1000AP or 600AD  and instead actually play serious games like he used to while giving tips on pathing, clear, mechanics for specific champs etc.

NB3 : can i get a kappa123 in the chat jebaited feelsbadman dude that was my penta you stole my penta *quits*  *weeb stuff* oh my kappaccino

how is redmercy clickbait

I'm a long time fan of Redmercy so I'll explain it to you.
Back then, all of his videos were a perfect mix between being informative and entertaining with normal, not all caps title. Now with the change to the youtube algorithm, he now puts some words in his video titles in all caps.

All Female Youtube Gamers : 

Pretend you are very girly to get donations and subscribes from horny nerds
An exception to that is LilyPichu and Pokimane. Both are legitimately fine youtube gamers.
